column4: hi, I have this kind of problem, already googledet it and didnt get any answer for it. So I just started to install ubuntu 5.10 (self burned but I think cd is fine) on old Compaq Presario 1630. When installer starts to do "Detecting hardware to find CD-ROM drives it goes to 83% and then stucks and I get message: Loading module 'ide-disk' for 'Linux ATA DISK'
anyonke know anything about my problem?
I've seen that complaint here before, but I don't know the answer to it
